exports.name: magma_query
exports.description: Performs a query and returns a result synchronously.

arguments.name: file_descriptor
arguments.description: An open device of class gpu.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: Either MAGMA_QUERY_DEVICE_ID, or a vendor-specific id starting from MAGMA_QUERY_VENDOR_PARAM_0.

exports.name: magma_create_connection
exports.description: Opens a connection to a device.

arguments.name: file_descriptor
arguments.description: An open device of class gpu.

exports.name: magma_release_connection
exports.description: Releases the given connection.

exports.name: magma_get_error
exports.description: Returns the first recorded error since the last time this function was called, and clears the recorded error. Incurs a round-trip to the system driver

exports.name: magma_create_context
exports.description: Creates a context on the given connection.

exports.name: magma_release_context
exports.description: Releases the context associated with the given id.

exports.name: magma_create_buffer
exports.description: Creates a memory buffer of at least the given size.

exports.name: magma_release_buffer
exports.description: Releases the given memory buffer.

exports.name: magma_duplicate_handle
exports.description: Duplicates the given handle, giving another handle that can be imported into a connection.

exports.name: magma_release_buffer_handle
exports.description: Releases the given handle.

exports.name: magma_get_buffer_id
exports.description: Returns a unique id for the given buffer.

exports.name: magma_get_buffer_size
exports.description: Returns the actual size of the given buffer.

exports.name: magma_clean_cache
exports.description: Cleans, and optionally invalidates, the cache for the region of memory specified by the given buffer, offset, and size, and write the contents to ram.

arguments.name: offset
arguments.description: An offset into the buffer. Must be less than or equal to the buffer's size.

arguments.name: size
arguments.description: Size of region to be cleaned. Offset + size must be less than or equal to the buffer's size.

exports.name: magma_set_cache_policy
exports.description: Configures the cache for the given buffer.

exports.name: magma_get_buffer_cache_policy
exports.description: Queries the cache policy for a buffer.

exports.name: magma_get_buffer_is_mappable
exports.description: Queries whether a buffer is mappable with magma_map or magma_map_aligned

arguments.name: flags
arguments.description: Reserved for future use. Must be 0.

exports.name: magma_map
exports.description: Maps the given buffer's memory into the calling process's address space.

arguments.name: addr_out
arguments.description: The returned CPU virtual address for the start of the buffer.

exports.name: magma_map_aligned
exports.description: Maps the given buffer's memory into the calling process's address space with a given alignment.

arguments.name: alignment
arguments.description: The requested alignment. Must be a power of 2 and at least PAGE_SIZE.

arguments.name: addr_out
arguments.description: The returned CPU virtual address for the start of the buffer.

exports.name: magma_map_specific
exports.description: Maps a region of the given buffer's memory at the given CPU virtual address. Fails if the buffer was previously mapped, or if the address range is unavailable.

arguments.name: offset
arguments.description: Offset into the buffer. Must be less than or equal to the buffer's size.

arguments.name: length
arguments.description: Size of region to be mapped. Offset + length must be less than or equal to the buffer's size.

exports.name: magma_unmap
exports.description: Releases a CPU mapping for the given buffer. Should be paired with each call to one of the mapping interfaces.

arguments.name: buffer
arguments.description: A valid buffer with at least one active CPU mapping.

exports.name: magma_map_buffer_gpu
exports.description: Maps a number of pages from the given buffer onto the GPU in the connection's address space at the given address.

arguments.name: page_offset
arguments.description: Offset into the buffer in pages.

arguments.name: gpu_va
arguments.description: Destination GPU virtual address for the mapping.

exports.name: magma_unmap_buffer_gpu
exports.description: Releases the mapping at the given address from the GPU.

arguments.name: gpu_va
arguments.description: A GPU virtual address associated with an existing mapping of the given buffer.

exports.name: magma_commit_buffer
exports.description: Ensures that the given page range of a buffer is backed by physical memory.

exports.name: magma_export
exports.description: Exports the given buffer, returning a handle that may be imported into another connection.

exports.name: magma_import
exports.description: Imports and takes ownership of the buffer referred to by the given handle.

exports.name: magma_create_command_buffer
exports.description: Creates a buffer of the given size that may be submitted as a command buffer.

arguments.name: size
arguments.description: The requested size of the buffer.

exports.name: magma_release_command_buffer
exports.description: Releases a command buffer without submitting it.

exports.name: magma_submit_command_buffer
exports.description: Submits a command buffer for execution on the GPU, and transfers ownership to the given context.

arguments.name: command_buffer
arguments.description: A valid buffer containing valid magma_system_command_buffer structures.

exports.name: magma_execute_immediate_commands
exports.description: Submits a series of commands for execution on the GPU without using a command buffer.

arguments.name: command_count
arguments.description: The number of commands in the provided buffer.

arguments.name: command_buffers
arguments.description: An array of command_count magma_system_inline_command_buffer structs.

exports.name: magma_create_semaphore
exports.description: Creates a semaphore.

exports.name: magma_release_semaphore
exports.description: Releases the given semaphore.

exports.name: magma_get_semaphore_id
exports.description: Returnes a unique id for the given semaphore.

exports.name: magma_signal_semaphore
exports.description: Signals the given semaphore.

exports.name: magma_reset_semaphore
exports.description: Resets the given semaphore.

exports.name: magma_wait_semaphores
exports.description: Waits for one or all provided semaphores to be signaled. Does not reset any semaphores.

arguments.name: count
arguments.description: Number of semaphores in the array.

arguments.name: timeout_ms
arguments.description: Time to wait before returning MAGMA_STATUS_TIMED_OUT.

arguments.name: wait_all
arguments.description: If true, wait for all semaphores, otherwise wait for any semaphore.

exports.name: magma_export_semaphore
exports.description: Exports the given semaphore, returning a handle that may be imported into another connection

exports.name: magma_import_semaphore
exports.description: Imports and takes ownership of the semaphore referred to by the given handle.

exports.name: magma_get_notification_channel_handle
exports.description: Returns a uint32_t (zx_handle_t) that can be waited on to determine when the connection has data in the notification channel. This channel has the same lifetime as the connection and must not be closed by the client.

exports.name: magma_wait_notification_channel
exports.description: Returns MAGMA_STATUS_OK if a message is available on the notification channel before the given timeout expires.

arguments.name: timeout_ns
arguments.description: Time to wait before returning MAGMA_STATUS_TIMED_OUT.

exports.name: magma_read_notification_channel
exports.description: Reads a notification from the channel into the given buffer.

arguments.name: buffer
arguments.description: Buffer into which to read notification data.

arguments.name: buffer_size_out
arguments.description: Returned size of the notification data written to the buffer, or 0 if there are no messages pending.
